accelerating to something

2005-07-20


Sorry updates have been sparse lately. Today was my first last visit to a school... Kadochu. This school used to be a bit of a drag to go to, but I feel like it has turned for the better in the past couple of years. The kids were very sweet to me today, and I made it through my first goodbye speech and song. I should make a verse in Japanese about sucking at sayonara.
